description: User management components for viewing, editing, and managing users

components.name: UserManagement
components.description: Main user management container with search and user list

components.name: UserList
components.description: Data table showing users with columns for username, email, role, level, and status

components.name: UserActions
components.description: Action buttons for user management operations

components.name: UserListAdmin
components.description: Admin table of users with search, filter, pagination, and action buttons

props.name: users
props.description: Array of user objects to display

props.name: onEdit
props.description: Callback when edit button is clicked (userId)

props.name: onDelete
props.description: Callback when delete button is clicked (userId)

props.name: onAdd
props.description: Callback when add user button is clicked

components.name: UserForm
components.description: Form for creating or editing a user with validation

props.name: user
props.description: User object for editing (null for creating new user)

props.name: onSubmit
props.description: Callback when form is submitted with user data

props.name: onCancel
props.description: Callback when cancel button is clicked

children.title: {{user ? 'Edit User' : 'Create New User'}}
children.subheader: {{user ? 'Update user information and permissions' : 'Add a new user to the system'}}

children.children: User's permission level in the system

components.name: UserDetail
components.description: Detailed view of a single user with profile information and actions

props.name: userId
props.description: ID of the user to display

props.name: onEdit
props.description: Callback when edit button is clicked

props.name: onDelete
props.description: Callback when delete button is clicked

props.name: onBack
props.description: Callback when back button is clicked
